reviewText: Unlike a lot of recent WM movies, this one reminded me of the original movies (from long, long ago) by Warren himself. The soundtrack was a nice mix of tunes, had a fun mix of silly bits, was a lot about the skiers and not just extreme stunts. Johnny Mosley narrates well, but lacks Warrens humor. All in all much better than the previous half dozen BigCorp WM movies.
Item arrived on time and as expected!

Every year we purchase the new DVD.  With lots of "skiing", they still surprise us with many locations and/or skiing types.  We have never been skiiers but we always love seeing the Warren Miller DVDs.
